   sphinx-quickstart on Thu May 17 12:31:39 2018.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to bamnostic's documentation!
=====================================

This documentation site is a work in progress as I continue to hone my
reStructuredText skills. All of the module documentation is here, but a more
detailed "Getting Started" should be available soon.

.. NOTE::
    CRAM format is not supported at this time.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:
   
   Installation <install>
   Getting Started <quickstart>
   Module documentation <bamnostic>
   Citation and Support <support>
